attributes.action: ensure the English Kennel Club cease its single Challenge Certificate Experiment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The English Kennel Club has instituted a single Challenge Certificate(instead of the usual two)in certain numerically small breeds.
This was originally an experiment but has continued un-challenged for the last four years, and appears to be now established without any active consultation with breed clubs, or those involved in the showing of pedigree dogs.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
